changeOwner(address).details: Can only be actioned by the current owner. Requires that _newOwner is not address zero

constructor.details: During Deploy the Ethereum address used to deploy the Smart Contract is set as the "owner" and certain functions below can only be actioned by the owner

params._duration: Duration of fund-raising part of Contract, in blocks
params._goal: Financial goal of the Smart Contract, in wei
params._minimumContribution: Minimum amount required for each contribution, in wei

contribute().details: Payable function that should be sent Ether. Requires that minimum contribution value is met and deadline is not passed

deployFunds().details: Can only be actioned by the owner

getRefund().details: Requires that the contribution exists and the deadline has not passed
